markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Snare Hopping](/Spells.aspx?ID=776)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 235 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 10 feet

**Target** one snare you built
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You may not have placed your snare in the right place, but you can magically move it there. You teleport the target snare to another unoccupied location in range.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The range of the spell increases by 10 feet.
name: Snare Hopping
